00034 //............................................................................
00035 // get up to *pn bytes of contiguous memory
00036 uint8_t const *QS::getBlock(uint16_t *pNbytes) {
00037     uint8_t *block;
00038     if (QS_used_ == (QSCtr)0) {
00039         *pNbytes = (uint16_t)0;
00040         block = (uint8_t *)0;                  // no bytes to return right now
00041     }
00042     else {
00043         QSCtr n = (QSCtr)(QS_end_ - QS_tail_);
00044         if (n > QS_used_) {
00045             n = QS_used_;
00046         }
00047         if (n > (QSCtr)(*pNbytes)) {
00048             n = (QSCtr)(*pNbytes);
00049         }
00050         *pNbytes = (uint16_t)n;
00051         QS_used_ = (QSCtr)(QS_used_ - n);
00052         QSCtr t  = QS_tail_;
00053         QS_tail_ = (QSCtr)(QS_tail_ + n);
00054         if (QS_tail_ == QS_end_) {
00055             QS_tail_ = (QSCtr)0;
00056         }
00057         block = &QS_ring_[t];
00058     }
00059     return block;
00060 }
